display_html:
data PartOfSpeech
  • = Adjective
  • | Adverb
  • | Conjunction
  • | Determiner
  • | Noun
  • | Numeral
  • | Prefix
  • | Preposition
  • | Pronoun
  • | Suffix
  • | Verb
name: PartOfSpeech Prefix Verb Adjective Adverb Conjunction Determiner Noun Numeral Preposition Pronoun Suffix

display_html: runSQLAction :: SqlPersistT (ResourceT (NoLoggingT IO)) a -> IO a
name: runSQLAction

display_html:
data Language = Language {
  • languageLname :: !LanguageName
}
name: Language Language languageLname

display_html:
data Word = Word {
  • wordWord :: !WordText
  • wordLangId :: !(Key Language)
  • wordPartOfSpeech :: !PartOfSpeech
  • wordForgotten :: !Bool
}
name: Word Word wordLangId wordForgotten wordPartOfSpeech wordWord

display_html:
data Translation = Translation {
  • translationFromWordId :: !(Key Word)
  • translationToLangId :: !(Key Language)
  • translationToWordId :: !(Maybe (Key Word))
  • translationComment :: !(Maybe Comment)
  • translationAltTranslation :: !(Maybe Text)
}
name: Translation Translation translationToWordId translationToLangId translationFromWordId translationAltTranslation translationComment

display_html:
data WordOrigin = WordOrigin {
  • wordOriginWordId :: !(Key Word)
  • wordOriginComment :: !(Maybe Comment)
  • wordOriginEvolvedYn :: !Bool
  • wordOriginMigratedYn :: !Bool
  • wordOriginCombinedYn :: !Bool
  • wordOriginDerivatedYn :: !Bool
}
name: WordOrigin WordOrigin wordOriginDerivatedYn wordOriginCombinedYn wordOriginMigratedYn wordOriginEvolvedYn wordOriginComment wordOriginWordId

display_html:
data WordOriginFrom = WordOriginFrom {
  • wordOriginFromWordFromId :: !(Key Word)
  • wordOriginFromOriginId :: !(Key WordOrigin)
}
name: WordOriginFrom WordOriginFrom wordOriginFromOriginId wordOriginFromWordFromId

display_html:
data EvolveLaw = EvolveLaw {
  • evolveLawLangFromId :: !(Key Language)
  • evolveLawLangToId :: !(Key Language)
  • evolveLawSoundRegexFrom :: !SoundRegex
  • evolveLawSoundTo :: !Sound
  • evolveLawPriority :: !Priority
}
name: EvolveLaw EvolveLaw evolveLawPriority evolveLawSoundTo evolveLawSoundRegexFrom evolveLawLangToId evolveLawLangFromId
